channel.title: Godcard: Another Time [Character Sheet]
channel.description:
Put all characters here so we won't need to scroll up every time we want to see who's what. Fill this sheet to start. _A like from me or Damafaud means the character is accepted._
**CHARACTER INFORMATION** **Name(s) and/or Alias**: **Age**: **Gender**: **Character Alignment**: (This may impact card-attunement a lot. [See this for more](http://easydamus.com/alignment.html)) **Backstory**: (At least a solid paragraph. Occupation, etc) **Appearance**: (Written or a picture, preferably a picture)
**BLACK CARD INFORMATION**
**Card Name/Figure AND Alignment**: (The deity or figure your card represent + the alignment of the god)
**Card Generation**: (Start off at 1st. Increase with RP progression.)
**Card Backstory**: (Some basic info on the figure it represents. Just a basic overview. Don't go overboard writing several paragraphs on me. [You can use this for reference.](http://www.mjyoung.net/dungeon/char/deity041.html) Any god is good, no need to take from that site.)
**Card Powers**: (Only the ones that the card has unlocked on the generation so far. Remember; the more attuned the user is to the card and the more he uses it - the faster its generation will grow. Each generation means an increase in power.)
Please join the discord! It helps us and you a lot for management and RP purposes! (And please read the rules ;) ) https://discord.gg/nsqXm4a

item.title: Godcard: Another Time [Character Sheet]
item.dc:creator: Monkke
item.description:
CHARACTER INFORMATION
Name(s) and/or Alias: Raul Long
Age: 47
Gender: Male
Character Alignment: REDACTED
Backstory: Formerly a leader of mercenary group, currently considers himself retired. Followed a strict code when it came to his job. No longer follows that code. 5 years ago, he recieved a godcard, which caused him to terrorize the city. He was rather successful, until he simply disappeared 5 years ago.
Appearance

BLACK CARD / MAGIC INFORMATION:

No information found…

Read full topic

item.title: Godcard: Another Time [Character Sheet]
item.dc:creator: Munstrish
item.description:
Name(s) and/or Alias: Joseph Carter
Age: 18
Gender: M
Character Alignment: Chaotic Good
Backstory: Since he was young, Joe has loved to play with electronics. When he was five he became known for coming first in a programming competition meant for adults. Since then, he has been programming and gaming like crazy, becoming one of the top in the country at computing. His best friend is Toby, and they love to meet up and play games often. Joe can often be a bit hot-headed, and acts on impulse a lot.
Appearance:

BLACK CARD INFORMATION

Card Name/Figure AND Alignment: Thor (Chaotic Good)

Card Generation: 1

Card Backstory: In Norse mythology, Thor is the hammer-wielding god of thunder, lightning, storms, oak trees, strength, the protection of mankind, and also hallowing, and fertility. Thor is one of the sons of Odin, and is very prominent in Norse mythology.

Card Powers:

1- Discharge Sensor: The user can sense if electricity is flowing through an object or not.

Read full topic

item.title: Godcard: Another Time [Character Sheet]
item.dc:creator: Braixen
item.description:
Alias: Yami
Age: 18?
Gender: Male
Character Alignment: Neutral Evil
Backstory: Yami is always looking at how to be the king. The king of what you might ask? Well that is for you to decide. The origin of Yami is unknown and his very existence is shrouded in mystery. Is he a creature of the devil himself?
Appearance:

Card Name: Death
Alignment: Neutral Evil

Card Generation: 1st

Card Backstory: This card represents one of the four horsemen of the Apocolypse, Death (also known as the grim reaper). https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Death_(personification)

Card Powers:

Generation 1: Death’s Curse - Can drink poisoned/disease ridden/dirty drinks and they will have no effect on the user

Read full topic

item.title: Godcard: Another Time [Character Sheet]
item.dc:creator: Jazz
item.description:
Name: Natalie Black

Age: 19

Gender: Female

Backstory: Natalie, or Nat as she is often called, is a college student. She lives in a mediocre apartment and works a kinda boring job stacking shelves, she lives with her roommate Claudette.

Appearance:
https://pre00.deviantart.net/a43c/th/pre/f/2015/223/d/c/psyche_by_kr0npr1nz-d956urr.jpg

Card Figure: Morpheus

Card Generation: 1st

Card Backstory:

Card Powers:

  1. Dreamsight - Nat can see what people are dreaming of by touching them.

Read full topic

item.title: Godcard: Another Time [Character Sheet]
item.dc:creator: PolikShadowbliss
item.description:
Secondary Character Information

Name: Mabel Winterhart
Age: 23
Character Alignment: Unknown but appears to be neutral.
Backstory: Oh, where to start. She was in the original Godcard serving as sort of muscle for Raul Long himself. Together they terrorized New York, even going so far as killing a member of the Olympus Group and forcing the good guys to form the notorious Iron God project, a military project meant to combat Godcard users. During their many exploits, the two partners in crime developed a budding romance and ended up falling for each other. Alas, that was short-lived. After a grueling battle in the graveyard involving a particular villain, Mabel ended up “accidentally” killing the man against Raul’s orders. Raul, mad as he was with the power of the Godcards already in his possession, blamed Mabel for his missed attempt at getting a godcard and a result, not only broke off their deal but attempted to kill Mabel. Mabel escaped with the help of Fade, another Godcard user, and has went into hiding. During her time hiding, she discovered an actual God living in the woods and also discovered the dire consequences of letting magic run loose in the world. Mainly, the reawakening of the Gods themselves and the possible, at least in her mind, end of the known world.
Appearance: https://kechake-stock.deviantart.com/art/Winterhearted-8-143240937

Card Information: Set, Neutral Evil.
Card Backstory: Set is the Egyptian god of Sand and Discord. Seth represented everything that threatened harmony in Egypt. He was the brother of Osiris and Isis, as well as the brother/husband of Nepthys. He murdered his brother Osiris, then battled with his nephew Horus to be the ruler of the living.
Card Powers: Generation 1: Intuition - User is able to detect backstabs and deception.

Read full topic

item.title: Godcard: Another Time [Character Sheet]
item.dc:creator: Whammerist
item.description:
Name: Tanner Skye

Age: 22

Gender: Male

Character Alignment: Neutral Good

Backstory: Left his small hometown in Alabama to study business in New York. Extremely friendly and charismatic, as well as bright. Often has trouble considering the opinions of others and adjusting to new or uncomfortable situations.

Appearance:

—-

Card Information: Helios, Chaotic Good.

Card Generation: 1st Generation.

Card Backstory: Helios, the personification of the sun. Drove the chariot of the sun across the sky each day, with his trusty steeds of fire.

Card Powers:
Generation 1: Sunbeam - The cardholder has the ability to summon a beam of light from their hands — of similar strength to a typical household flashlight.

Read full topic

item.title: Godcard: Another Time [Character Sheet]
item.dc:creator: Munstrish
item.description:
Name(s) and/or Alias: Julia Beathen
Age: 60
Gender: F
Character Alignment: True Neutral
Backstory: Julia was born blind, but showed a better than average ability at coping with it. She learned braille and seemed to almost sense things before she touched them, making her crash into things much less often. In later life, she got a stable job as a clairvoyant, calling herself ‘The All-Seeing Blind Clairvoyant’. She is very proud of her grandson, Toby.
Appearance: https://thenullset.files.wordpress.com/2012/01/hanasaku_iroha_01.jpg

BLACK CARD INFORMATION

Card Name/Figure AND Alignment: Antevorta (True Neutral)
Card Generation: 1

Card Backstory: In ancient Roman religion, Antevorta was a goddess of the future. She and her sister Postverta were described as companions or siblings of the goddess Carmenta. They may have originally been two aspects of Carmenta, namely those of her knowledge of the future and the past (compare the two-faced Janus).

Card Powers:

  1. Sight: The cardholder has the ability of above average vision. They can notice things that others may not notice.

Read full topic

item.title: Godcard: Another Time [Character Sheet]
item.dc:creator: Icibalus
item.description:
CHARACTER INFORMATION
Name(s) and/or Alias: Kaden Smith, AKA Agent Viper
Age: 45
Gender: Male
Character Alignment: Lawful Evil
Backstory: From a plain and uninteresting chldhood a young man showed up at the army, saying that he was to be recruited. He barely passed the physical tests, but on the mental tests Kaden Smith showed his true colours, showing a razor-sharp mind and an unstoppable drive to reach the top. In 5 years, after an honourable discharge at the rank of Captain, he joined the FBI.

As it happened, he rose through the ranks quickly due to his superiors being involved with several minor scandals that seemed to do nothing for him, yet after just 2 years he was the senior foreign agent. He’s known throughout the agency for always playing by the rules, but only by the letter. The only reason he hasn’t been fired is because his bending of the rules to their very limits benefits the FBI greatly.

Appearance: A tall man with black hair, wearing a black suit and black tie always. He gives off an air of imperious seriousness, but his most defining feature is his eye color. He is not blind, but a rare genetic defect means that his eyes appear to be completely white unless you are starting right into them. There, you can see the shape of his pupils and his iris, which are both a very light grey.

BLACK CARD INFORMATION

Card Name/Figure AND Alignment: Ouranos (Lawful Evil)

Card Generation: 2

Card Backstory: Ouranos (Uranus), the Greek god of the sky and the origin of all the gods. He disposed of all the children you deemed to be disfigured and impure and cast them in chains to the pits of Tartarus, and was eventually murdered by his son Chronos.

Card Powers:

Generation 1 - Sky Affinity - The user’s physical strenght increases the higher above sea level they are.
Generation 2 - Levitate - The user can float about 5cm above the ground at will.

may actually try this time, as I said on the interest check. Probably going to only show up in force later in the RP

Read full topic

item.title: Godcard: Another Time [Character Sheet]
item.dc:creator: Shurian
item.description:
CHARACTER INFORMATION
Is completed.
Name(s) and/or Alias: Shelia Levis
Age: 17
Gender: F
Character Alignment: Chaotic Good
Backstory: A singer who stopped growing at the age of 14 due to a rare genetic deficiency. (Her family does make her insecure inside because they grow up so much more) However, she doesn’t let it get her down, and her voice rings through, just like her attitude. However, she can be quite brash at times… But… she deeply cares for her friends and family. Even if she doesnt show it directly.

BLACK CARD INFORMATION

Card Name/Figure AND Alignment: (Apollo)/Chaotic Good
Card Generation: 1
Card Backstory: Birthed on the island of Delos, son of Zeus. He slain those who oppressed his family at a young age, and is known for his knowledge of the arts. His skill with a lyre is very much appreciated by many in the world, agreeing that he would be the god of music and singing.
Card Powers

Song of Rejuvenation: Out of combat, the cardholder can restore minor cuts, bruises and vitality on others in a small area around the cardholder. Duration of song depends on the cardholder, as songs are strenuous on the cardholder’s mental energy.

Read full topic

item.title: Godcard: Another Time [Character Sheet]
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
(possible second character, anyone is free to use him playing him)
Name: David U Oleander
Age: 14
Gender: M
Alignment: NL
Backstory: He is a freshman in highschool who is doing pretty well. he tries his best to stay positive and not make enemies, but he tends to be antisocial and stay away from people altogther. He doesnt know this, but he used to have an older brother. sadly this brother died when David was quite young, and as such David has no memory of him.
Appearance: A relatively tall person, about 4’11", with very curly hair thats a light brown, bordering on red. its quite wispy. emerald green eyes. thin, but definitely not lacking in muscle.
BLACK CARD:
Anubis, LN
Gen 1
Backstory: the egyptian god of death, responsible for making sure people cross the river styx safely
Card powers:
River Tallies - you may sense the presence of spirits within 2 meters of your location, and request to speak with them telepathically. if they accept, you will be able to see and hear them until they leave the range.

Read full topic

item.title: Godcard: Another Time [Character Sheet]
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
CHARACTER INFORMATION
Name: Marcus G. Aveyerd
Age: 19
Gender: M
Character Alignment: Lawful Neutral
Backstory:
Back story before cards Existed (from Godcard 1)
when he was 9, his parents died, and he has since been raised by the grave keeper in the graveyard where his parents funeral was held. he has no brothers or sisters to speak of. Now he helps all the visitors grieve and facilitate the resting of the dead.
Going into Another Time
before the cards disappeared, Fade (G) thought it best to keep Marcus safe so he went away to hunt for raul as he was a danger to his son. he left Marcus in a friends “safe” hand but never returned. sadly this friend was actually quite abusive (in the way that he didnt care for marcus in pretty much any way), and fade just never knew. so about one year into this marcus gathered his belongings and ran away. the friend hasnt noticed to this day. Since then he has been living on the streets in new york, getting enough for food by working every now and then at a pizza place. everywhere he goes he carries his “card” with him. its a cardboard cutout, poorly colored in with crayon. his new cardboard box is very homey
Appearance from Godcard 1: a young man with coal-black hair, and light-hazel eyes, about 5’2 tall
Appearance Now: a bit taller (maybe 2 inches). he’s also some more muscle on him, and is not nearly as wiry. however he shows clear signs of malnourishment and a general unkempt look from being homeless

BLACK CARD INFORMATION

Card Name: Hades, Lawful Neutral

Card Generation: 1

Card Backstory:
Backstory, god of the underworld, brother of zeus and poseidon. he’s the one who make sure the dead stay dead

Card Powers:
Gen: 1 Deal with the devil - people are better at convincing people than most.

Read full topic

item.title: Godcard: Another Time [Character Sheet]
item.dc:creator: MaximusPrime
item.description:
CHARACTER INFORMATION

Name(s) and/or Alias: Jayden Hayes, Jay
Age: 17
Gender: Male
Character Alignment: Chaotic Neutral
Backstory: Jay started swimming when he was 8, aspiring to participate in the Olympics someday. Now, having received recognition from organizations for being the fastest swimmer in the county, he is the target of hatred and jealousy. Many people either put on fake smiles around him or avoid him completely due to his ability and fame. He is willing to do nearly anything to further his swimming career.
Appearance:

BLACK CARD INFORMATION

Card Name/Figure AND Alignment: Poseidon/Chaotic Neutral
Card Generation: 1
Card Backstory: God of the sea and rivers, creator of storms and floods, and the bringer of earthquakes and destruction, Poseidon was perhaps the most disruptive of all the ancient Greek gods, not only for mortals but also to Zeus’ reign on Olympus.
Card Powers:

Gen 1. Speed Swimming: The cardholder is able to move faster than normal in water.

Read full topic

item.title: Godcard: Another Time [Character Sheet]
item.dc:creator: Queen_Alfa
item.description:
CHARACTER INFORMATION

Name: Ritika Aurora
Age: 20
Gender: F
Character Alignment: CG
Backstory: After being abandoned as a child because her love of dancing didn’t resonate with her old family’s views Ritika was taken in by an owner of a bar, that owner took care of Ritika till she was 18, after that Ritika wanted to repay the kindness, so she did what she loved the most, she danced. And danced she did, her dancing brought many visitors to the bar.

Appearance

BLACK CARD INFORMATION

Card Name: Ama-no-Uzume CG
Card Generation: 2
Card Backstory: Ame-no-Uzume-no-mikoto is the Kami of dawn, happiness and joy in the Shinto religion of Japan. She is famous for her role in the tale of the sun goddess, Amaterasu. Basically, to get the sun goddess out she danced on top of a boat naked which brought the sun goddess out of her cave.

Card Powers

Gen 1: Bonne Danseuse - Is able to dance better than most normal dancer making her a sight to behold.
Gen 2: Papillon Doré - When she dances small golden butterflies are sometimes seen, making her performance beautiful.

Read full topic

item.title: Godcard: Another Time [Character Sheet]
item.dc:creator: PolikShadowbliss
item.description:
CHARACTER INFORMATION
Name: Misty White
Age: 19
Gender: F
Character Alignment: Chaotic Neutral.
Backstory: A freshmen in college, she works part-time as a waitress.

BLACK CARD INFORMATION
Card Generation: 1
Card Name: Aphrodite, Chaotic Neutral.
Card Backstory: The greek goddess of love and fertility, the sweet and demure goddess, the ever-smiling goddess. The greeks associated her with absolute beauty and grace, but like all greek gods and goddesses, she was in fact anything but sweet and demure. Often she would punish mortals for being much more beautiful than her. One time she even made someone fall in love with a bull, thus creating the minotaur.

Card Powers
PERSONAL LEVEL
Gen 1: Beauty and Grace - You are able to enhance and control your physical appearance to a certain point, you can make yourself much prettier, more graceful, and more mature than the average person. However, you will not be perfection embodied nor irresistible. This is not an illusion, but an actual physical transformation. However, due to the unnatural enhancements, your body can only maintain the transformation for an hour…

Appearance:

Read full topic

item.title: Godcard: Another Time [Character Sheet]
item.dc:creator: PoisonedSquid
item.description:
CHARACTER INFORMATION
Name(s) and/or Alias : Eliza Wallace
Age : 20
Gender : Female
Character Alignment : Lawful Good
Backstory : Elisa is a quiet college student who has a passion for books. She mostly spends her time in the library reading about the most obscure books imaginable. She doesn’t know what she wants to do when she graduates, but she always looks forward to the moment when she finally has an answer.
Appearance :

BLACK CARD INFORMATION

Card Name/Figure AND Alignment : Athena - Lawful Good
Card Backstory : Athena is the daughter of Zeus who was born from his head caused by a spell that made her turn into a fly. She is a fearsome foe in combat, but peaceful when there is no turbulence. She is the protector of Athens and other areas of Greece. She also becomes heavily involved in art and literature. She even guided Odysseus often a form of an owl along a dangerous journey.
Card Powers :
Card Generation : 2nd
Personal Level:
1. Study: The user of the card is able to obtain more information about a nearby object by looking directly at the object for five seconds. If Study is used on an object, then the user will know its origin and materials.
2. Interpretation: The user is able to understand any modern language spoken or written.

Read full topic

item.title: Godcard: Another Time [Character Sheet]
item.dc:creator: CheesyKnives
item.description:
CHARACTER INFORMATION
Name(s) and/or Alias: Toby Beathen
Age: 19
Gender: Male
Character Alignment: Lawful Good
Backstory: Is a massive video game fan, and possesses a small YouTube channel dedicated to everything about video games. He is considered quite intelligent, but bizarre. He attempts to be courageous but it can easily be broken with hard hitting insults.

Appearance:

BLACK CARD INFORMATION

Card Name/Figure: Osiris, Lawful Good

Card Generation: 2

In Egyptian mythology, Osiris is the god of life, death, the flooding of the Nile and the afterlife. He was the brother and husband of Isis. They had a son named Horus. Osiris was murdered by his brother Set because Osiris was pharaoh, which Set wanted to be. Osiris was killed when Set tricked him into getting into a box, then poured Lead onto the box to close it so Osiris could not get out of it. However, Isis brought Osiris back to life for one night. After Horus was old enough, he defeated Set and became the pharaoh. Osiris’ mother was the goddess Nut, father Geb, sister Nephthys, and sister as well as wife Isis. He was around to protect the Egyptians from the underworld. (not from wikipedia i swear)

Card Powers:

1.Afterlife’s Eye (Under Above the Earth): Can sense the concentration of spirits in an area. Cannot interact with them. (Can also see spirits.)

Read full topic

item.title: Godcard: Another Time [Character Sheet]
item.dc:creator: SoulShard
item.description:
CHARACTER INFORMATION
Name: Vashni Luna
Age: 16
Gender: F
Character Alignment: Chaotic Good
Backstory: Current student at New York High is learning to become a vet. lives with her 2 parents

BLACK CARD INFORMATION

Card Generation:: 1

Card Name: Bast, Chaotic Good

Card Backstory: Bast was the ancient Egyptian goddess of protection and cats. She was the daughter of Ra, the sun god. As protectress, she was seen as defender of the pharaoh, after Sekhet, the lioness and consequently of the chief god, Ra.
n later times Bast became the goddess of protection and blessing,and was the protectress of women, children, and domestic cats. She was the goddess of sunrise, music, dance, and pleasure as well as family, fertility, and birth. When Anubis became the god of embalming, Bast, as goddess of ointment, was connected to him as his wife or mother, until Anubis became Nephthys’ son.

Card Powers

PERSONAL LEVEL:
Gen 1: Basts Influence Is able to control cats, in order to control a cat you must touch it and can only control 2 at a time. the effects of Basts Influence expire after 30 mins

Read full topic

item.title: Godcard: Another Time [Character Sheet]
item.dc:creator: Monkke
item.description:
CHARACTER INFORMATION
Name(s) and/or Alias: Peter Sithapelthik
Age: 65
Gender: Male
Character Alignment: Lawful Neutral
Backstory: A holy scribe working in various temples throughout the world, studying magical phenomena for decades. He recently arrived to Olympus Library, trying to help them solve the godcard situation.
Appearance:
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/455037097770745867/456466780811034629/unknown.png

item.title: Godcard: Another Time [Character Sheet]
item.dc:creator: Damafaud
item.description:
CHARACTER INFORMATION
Name(s) and/or Alias : Alice Patricia Johnson
Age : 32
Gender : Female
Character Alignment : Chaotic Neutral
Backstory : An accomplished engineer who decides to dedicate herself to the splendor of alcohol. She owns a bar and has been living there since her graduation. She takes in a child named Ritika, but she doesn’t really remember when. She has been thinking of getting married lately, but is still determined to never be sober for more than two days.
Appearance :

BLACK CARD INFORMATION

Card Name/Figure AND Alignment : Dionysos (Chaotic Neutral)
Card Generation : i
Card Backstory : Greek God of Wine, Festivity, and Theatre

Card Powers :

Gen 1: Good Liquor - Alice is able to increase the alcohol concentration in drinks

Read full topic

item.title: Godcard: Another Time [Character Sheet]
item.dc:creator: Daericul
item.description:
CHARACTER INFORMATION
Name and/or Alias: Lucifer Diabolus
Age: 30
Gender: Male
Character Alignment: Lawful evil
Backstory: A charismatic yet morally twisted man, Lucifer sees the world for what it is: an unordered and chaotic mess. He despises such a society, and swears never to fall to the level of those around him. This feeling was amplified whilst working in Raul’s mafia, seeing the disgraces the rest were. That led him to leaving and working alone.
Appearance:

BLACK CARD INFORMATION
Card Name/Figure AND Alignment: Satan, the Devil. Lawful evil.
Card Generation: I
Card Backstory: Vanquished from the Silver City after rebelling against his father, God, this fallen angel is known as the Ruler of Hell and root of all evil
Card Powers:

1. Palms of the Underworld: The cardholder holds the ability to increase the temperature of their palms to 50° C for one minute at a time.

Read full topic

item.title: Godcard: Another Time [Character Sheet]
item.dc:creator: Monkke
item.description:
Put all characters here so we won’t need to scroll up every time we want to see who’s what. Fill this sheet to start. A like from me or Damafaud means the character is accepted.

CHARACTER INFORMATION
Name(s) and/or Alias:
Age:
Gender:
Character Alignment: (This may impact card-attunement a lot. See this for more)
Backstory: (At least a solid paragraph. Occupation, etc)
Appearance: (Written or a picture, preferably a picture)

BLACK CARD INFORMATION

Card Name/Figure AND Alignment: (The deity or figure your card represent + the alignment of the god)

Card Generation: (Start off at 1st. Increase with RP progression.)

Card Backstory: (Some basic info on the figure it represents. Just a basic overview. Don’t go overboard writing several paragraphs on me. You can use this for reference. Any god is good, no need to take from that site.)

Card Powers: (Only the ones that the card has unlocked on the generation so far. Remember; the more attuned the user is to the card and the more he uses it - the faster its generation will grow. Each generation means an increase in power.)

Please join the discord! It helps us and you a lot for management and RP purposes! (And please read the rules ) https://discord.gg/nsqXm4a
